alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:10PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... North Meherrin River near Lunenburg affecting Lunenburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Meherrin River near Lunenburg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 PM EST Tuesday was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise exceeding 24 feet overnight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.9 feet on 09/19/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1015 AM EST.
